GET_VALUE: SELECT value FROM guildConfig WHERE id = :id AND key = :key;
SET_VALUE: INSERT INTO guildConfig (id, key, value) VALUES (:id, :key, :value) ON CONFLICT(id, key) DO UPDATE SET value = :value WHERE id = :id AND key = :key;
CREATE_USERS: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users ( id INTEGER NOT NULL, money INTEGER DEFAULT (0), xp INTEGER DEFAULT (0) );
CREATE_CONFIG: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guildConfig ( id INTEGER NOT NULL, key TEXT NOT NULL, value INTEGER DEFAULT (0), PRIMARY KEY(id, key) );
BALANCE: SELECT money FROM users WHERE id = :id;
SET_BALANCE: UPDATE users SET money = :money WHERE id = :id;
